title: Editing Files
content:
Common CLI editors

  • nano: simple and beginner-friendly
  • vi/vim: always available on servers
nano notes.txt
# or
vi notes.txt

Minimal vi survival

  • i: insert
  • Esc: normal mode
  • :wq: save and quit
  • :q!: quit without saving

Editing without an editor

printf "line1\nline2\n" > file.txt
echo "line3" >> file.txt
